General.Name: Nanjing Railway New Technology Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Nanjing Railway New Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, and manufacturing of various types of rail vehicle body parts and bogie parts. The company also offers electrical system components, including chassis components, wall panels, roof components, cab components, and other car body components, as well as traction brakes. In addition, it provides bogie components, such as shock absorbers and buffers; carbon steel products; rubber parts; and machine parts processing. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Nanjing, China.
